text: Tyacyakherija jyanci upasana tumhi karita ahata te sarva navapurateca aheta, jyanna tumhi ani tumacya purvajanni manane racuna ghetale ahe. Sarvasrestha allahane yanca konatahi purava avatarita kela nahi. Phaisala dene allahaceca kama ahe. Tyaca adesa ahe ki tumhi sarva tyacyasivaya konacihi bhakti- upasana karu naka. Haca satya dharma ahe, parantu adhikansa loka janata nahita
